sect2.title: Installation of Gawk
sect2.para: Install Gawk by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: cd awklib && cp Makefile.in Makefile.in.backup && sed -e '/^datadir/s/awk/gawk/' \ -e '/^libexecdir/s%/awk%%' Makefile.in.backup > Makefile.in && cd .. && ./configure --prefix=/usr --libexecdir=/usr/bin && make && make install
